greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function for A003658 (fundamental discriminants of real quadratic fields).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Block[{nn = 105, t}, t = ConstantArray[0, nn]; ReplacePart[t, Map[# -> 1 &, Select[Range@ nn, NumberFieldDiscriminant@ Sqrt@ # == # &]]]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 23 2017 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 22 2017
